means: （产于北美洲太平洋沿岸的）沙龙白珠树

sentence.Network_en: The elegant bouquet combines lilies, roses, bear grass and salal leaves , symbol of elegant and esteem.
sentence.Network_cn: 花束包括荷兰百合 、 玫瑰 、 梦幻草及沙巴叶等,配日式和纸包装, 清丽可人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Chinook Jargon sallal

means.word_mean: 1. small evergreen shrub of Pacific coast of North America having edible dark purple grape-size berries

auth_sentence.content: So if it is a floral green like salal or sword fern you may only be harvesting a few pounds of that every year off your property.
